abstract: Over 30 college students are arrested, interrogated and given 99 lashes each in Qazvin, Iran, for attending graduation party with both men and women present; punishments are thought to be part of wider crackdown by hard-line Muslims.

headline.print_headline: Iranian Students Arrested and Lashed 99 Times Over Coed Party
headline.main: Iranian Students Lashed 99 Times Over Coed Party

snippet: The punishments, believed to be part of a wider crackdown by a judiciary dominated by hard-liners, were carried out in record time.
lead_paragraph: The punishments, believed to be part of a wider crackdown by a judiciary dominated by hard-liners, were carried out in record time.
